scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "npx wait-on tcp:3001 && cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build && mkdir -p ../server/dist/client && cp -r dist/* ../server/dist/client/
